DOC.brief_title: The Status Asthma Korean Military Personnel
DOC.detailed_description: ISAAC ( International Study Asthma Allergies CHildhood ) questionnaires sent military personnel republic Korea . Military personnel randomly select representative number soldier area . We perform methacholine provocation test MAST current wheezer informed consent .
DOC.criteria: Korean military personnel respond questionnaire Person refuse participate study
